column7: Study at the graduate level in percussion; selected studies from the masterworks in percussion literature. Graduate standing in music, or successful completion of a qualifying audition for the appropriate applied music faculty. 2 to 5 graduate hours. No professional credit. May be repeated to a maximum of 20 hours. Prerequisite: Graduate standing in music, or successful completion of a qualifying audition for the percussion faculty.
column9: 2 to 5 graduate hours. No professional credit. May be repeated to a maximum of 20 hours. Prerequisite: Graduate standing in music, or successful completion of a qualifying audition for the percussion faculty.
